AT.name: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden
AT.description: Im Kampfspiel Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden sind die berühmtesten Charakters der Dragon Ball Z-Serie dabei. Du kannst sogar mit Charakteren aus dem aktuellen Film "Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F'" spielen! 2D-Kampfaction: Anime-Feeling dank 2D-Effekten! Viele Stunden Spielspaß: Im Modus “Z-Story” spielst du die Original-Geschichte des Mangas nach und im “Abenteuermodus” begeben sich die Spieler auf die Suche nach den Dragonballs. Außerdem kannst du im VS-Modus gegen Freunde oder CPU-Gegner kämpfen. Eine gewaltige Auswahl: Mehr als 120 spielbare und Z-Hilfe-Charaktere warten auf dich. Verrückte Team-Kämpfe: Du kannst für einen Kampf bis zu 5 spielbare und Z-Hilfe-Charaktere wählen. Dadurch nehmen bis zu 10 Charaktere gleichzeitig an den Kämpfen teil! Starke Moves: Je nach Situation stehen die verschiedensten Spezialmoves zur Verfügung! Ultimative Moves und Ebenbürtiger Ansturm sind fantastischer als je zuvor!

AU.name: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden
AU.description: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden is a fighting game including the most famous characters of Dragon Ball Z series. You can even play with characters from the latest movie Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection "F". 2D Fighting action: Anime-like graphics thanks to 2D effects. Hours of Gameplay: The “Story mode” follows the original story of the Manga and in the “Adventure mode” players aim to gather all the Dragon balls. A Versus mode is also part of the game to fight the computer or a friend. A huge Roster: More than 120 characters playable/assists are available. Crazy Team Battle: Possibility to choose 5 playable/assists characters for one fight. Up to 10 characters can fight each other on the screen! Strong moves: Enjoy variety of special moves depending on the situation, Ultimate Moves and Even Rush effects are more incredible than ever!

BG.name: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden
BG.description: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden is a fighting game including the most famous characters of Dragon Ball Z series. Crazy Team Battle: Possibility to choose 5 playable/assists characters for one fight. Up to 10 characters can fight each other on the screen! Strong moves: Enjoy variety of special moves depending on the situation, Ultimate Moves and Even Rush effects are more incredible than ever!

BE.name: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden
BE.description: Dans le jeu de combat Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden, retrouve les personnages les plus célèbres de la série Dragon Ball Z. Tu peux même incarner les personnages du dernier film Dragon Ball Z Resurrection "F". Des combats en 2D : des graphismes de type anime grâce aux effets 2D. Des heures de jeu : le Mode Histoire suit l'histoire originale du manga et le Mode Aventure permet aux joueurs de rassembler les Boules de cristal. Le Mode Versus propose d'affronter l'IA ou un ami. Une vaste galerie de personnages : plus de 120 personnages jouables/d'aide disponibles. Des combats en équipe délirants : tu peux choisir 5 personnages jouables/d'aide par combat et voir s'affronter à l'écran jusqu'à 10 personnages ! Des coups puissants : profite de nombreux coups spéciaux suivant les situations. Les effets des attaques ultimes et des enchaînements sont plus incroyables que jamais !

ES.name: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden
ES.description: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden es un juego de lucha en el que participan los personajes más famosos de la serie Dragon Ball Z. ¡Incluso puedes jugar con personajes de la última película, Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection "F"! Acción en 2D: gráficos de estilo anime, gracias a los efectos 2D. Horas de juego: el "Modo Historia" te permite seguir la historia original del manga; en el "Modo Aventura", el objetivo es conseguir todas las Bolas Dragón; y con el "Modo Versus" puedes enfrentarte a un amigo o a la IA. Una plantilla enorme: más de 120 personajes jugables y personajes Ayuda disponibles. Combates por equipos frenéticos: elige 5 personajes jugables y personajes Ayuda para librar un combate. ¡Pueden enfrentarse hasta 10 personajes en pantalla! Movimientos fuertes: disfruta de una gran variedad de movimientos especiales, según la situación. ¡Los efectos de Frenesí Regular y los Movimientos Definitivos son más impresionantes que nunca!

IT.name: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden
IT.description: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden è un gioco di combattimento basato sui più famosi personaggi della saga di Dragon Ball Z. Puoi persino guidare i personaggi del nuovo film, Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection "F". Azione di combattimento 2D: grafica in stile anime, grazie a spettacolari effetti 2D. Ore e ore di divertimento: la modalità trama segue le avventure originali del manga, mentre nella modalità avventura i giocatori devono radunare tutte le Sfere del Drago. Il gioco offre anche una modalità scontro, per affrontare la CPU o un amico. Moltissimi combattenti: sono disponibili oltre 120 personaggi giocabili/di assistenza. Frenetiche battaglie a squadre: puoi scegliere fino a 5 personaggi giocabili/di assistenza per combattere. Fino a 10 personaggi possono sfidarsi insieme sullo schermo! Potenti mosse: scopri numerose mosse speciali, variabili a seconda della situazione. Anche le mosse supreme e gli effetti degli impeti sono più incredibili che mai!

NL.name: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden
NL.description: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden is een vechtspel dat de meest beroemde personages uit de Dragon Ball Z-serie bevat. Je kunt zelfs spelen met personages uit de nieuwste film Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection "F". 2D-vechtactie: anime-graphics dankzij 2D-effecten. Uren aan gameplay: de "Story mode" volgt het originele verhaal van de Manga en in de "Adventure mode" moeten spelers alle Dragon Balls zien te verzamelen. Er is ook een "Versus mode" waarin je kunt vechten tegen de computer of een vriend. Een gigantisch rooster: meer dan 120 speelbare personages en assistenten beschikbaar. Fantastische Team Battle: kies 5 personages en assistenten voor één gevecht. Tot 10 personages kunnen tegelijk op het scherm tegen elkaar vechten! Sterke moves: gebruik verschillende speciale moves naar gelang de situatie, Ultimate Moves en Even Rush-effecten zijn geweldiger dan ooit!

NZ.description: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden is a fighting game including the most famous characters of Dragon Ball Z series. You can even play with characters from the latest movie Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection "F". 2D Fighting action: Anime-like graphics thanks to 2D effects. PT.name: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden
PT.description: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden é um jogo de luta que inclui as personagens mais famosas da série Dragon Ball Z. Até podes jogar com as personagens do recente filme Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection "F". Combates em 2D: Grafismo equiparável ao anime graças aos efeitos 2D. Horas de jogo: O modo “Story” segue a história original da manga, enquanto que no modo “Adventure” os jogadores têm como objetivo recolher todas as bolas do Dragão. Está também incluído um modo Versus para combateres contra o computador ou um amigo. Um grande elenco: Descobre mais de 120 personagens jogáveis/auxiliares. Batalhas de equipa loucas: Podes escolher até 5 personagens jogáveis/auxiliares para uma única luta, com um máximo de 10 personagens em combate no mesmo ecrã! Movimentos fortes: Utiliza vários movimentos especiais de acordo com a situação, com movimentos Ultimate e efeitos Rush mais incríveis que nunca!

RU.name: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden
RU.description: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden - это игра в жанре файтинг с самыми известными персонажами серии Dragon Ball Z, включая последний мультфильм - Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection 'F'. 2D-файтинг. Графика в стиле аниме с 2D-эффектами. Многочасовая игра. Несколько режимов: "Сюжет" (Story), продолжающий оригинальную историю манги; "Приключение" (Adventure), где нужно собрать все драконьи жемчужины; и "Поединок" (Versus), где можно сражаться с компьютером или другом. Огромный список персонажей. Более 120 доступно непосредственно для боев или в помощь. Сумасшедшие командные бои. Возможность выбрать 5 персонажей, которые будут участвовать в бою или смогут прийти на помощь. Одновременно на экране может быть до 10 персонажей! Наслаждайтесь разнообразием особых приемов, зависящих от ситуации. Абсолютные приемы и эффекты стремительных атак стали еще более невероятными, чем раньше.

Hours of Gameplay: The “Story mode” follows the original story of the Manga and in the “Adventure mode” players aim to gather all the Dragon balls. A Versus mode is also part of the game to fight the computer or a friend. A huge Roster: More than 120 characters playable/assists are available. Crazy Team Battle: Possibility to choose 5 playable/assists characters for one fight. Up to 10 characters can fight each other on the screen! Strong moves: Enjoy variety of special moves depending on the situation, Ultimate Moves and Even Rush effects are more incredible than ever!

SI.name: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden
SI.description: Dragon Ball Z: Extreme Butoden is a fighting game including the most famous characters of Dragon Ball Z series. You can even play with characters from the latest movie Dragon Ball Z: Resurrection "F". 2D Fighting action: Anime-like graphics thanks to 2D effects. Hours of Gameplay: The “Story mode” follows the original story of the Manga and in the “Adventure mode” players aim to gather all the Dragon balls. A Versus mode is also part of the game to fight the computer or a friend. A huge Roster: More than 120 characters playable/assists are available. Crazy Team Battle: Possibility to choose 5 playable/assists characters for one fight. Up to 10 characters can fight each other on the screen! Strong moves: Enjoy variety of special moves depending on the situation, Ultimate Moves and Even Rush effects are more incredible than ever!
